document.docAuthor: Niu, Ze-Qing, Zhu, Chao-Dong & Kuhlmann, Michael
document.masterDocTitle: The Bees of the Genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The Bees of the Genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) from China

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Colletes
Latreille 1802
: 423
. Type species:
Apis succincta
Linnaeus, 1758
, by monotypy.

subSubSection.paragraph:
A checklist of the
Colletes
species of China is provided in
Table 1
. All species of groups not treated in previous publications and additional records from China of species of the
C. clypearis
- and
C. succinctus
-groups are listed below in alphabetical order by their species-groups.

caption.paragraph:
TABLE 1. Checklist of the
Colletes
species of China in alphabetical order of species-groups.
